snippet: The Electric Zoo Festival, the annual electronic dance music gathering, took over Randalls Island a year after two festivalgoers died after using the synthetic party drug Molly.
abstract: Jon Pareles Critic's Notebook observes question facing sixth annual Electric Zoo Festival, three-day event on Randalls Island, is how party could be both orderly and fun, since two festivalgoers died from taking drug Molly in 2013; notes while festival's widely publicized strictures cut down on attendance, thousands of people still showed up in their party outfits.
lead_paragraph: The Electric Zoo Festival, the annual electronic dance music gathering, took over Randalls Island a year after two festivalgoers died after using the synthetic party drug Molly.

headline.seo: Electric Zoo Returns Under Watchful Eyes
headline.main: A Bit of Caution Beneath the Thump
headline.print_headline: A Bit of Caution Beneath the Thump
